entities.name: centaur
entities.description: The centaur is mentioned in the text as a reference to a mythological creature.

entities.name: sneak
entities.description: The sneak is mentioned in the text as a verb or action taken by someone.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is being chased by others.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts who is trying to catch Harry.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a teacher at Hogwarts who is delighted by Malfoy's success in catching Harry.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is one of the four houses at Hogwarts that receives points for Malfoy's actions.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is another name for Harry.

relationships.description: Malfoy receives help from Umbridge in catching Harry.
Malfoy is associated with Slytherin house and receives points for them.
Umbridge catches Potter (Harry) after he is tripped by Malfoy.
Malfoy trips Potter (Harry) to catch him.
